item.title: Fan Token Sector Surges, ATM Surpasses 80% Growth in 24 Hours
item.description: On July 28th, according to HTX market data, the fan token sector witnessed a general upward trend, including:· ATM rose by more than 80% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $2.07;· ASR increased by more than 37% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $5.32;· ACM surged by more than 22% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.06;· JUV went up by more than 20% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.18;· CITY rose by more than 18% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.06;· BAR surged by more than 16% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.29;· PSG increased by more than 16% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $1.86;· SANTOS rose by more than 16% in the past 24 hours and is currently trading at $2.61.

item.title: Tether Issues 1 Billion USDT on the Tron Network
item.description: On July 28th, as monitored by Whale Alert, Tether minted 1 billion USDT on the Tron network 20 minutes ago. Since the beginning of July this year, Tether has minted a cumulative total of 8 billion USDT.

item.title: Last week, digital asset investment products recorded a net inflow of $1.9 billion, with Ethereum seeing an inflow of $1.59 billion.
item.description: On July 28th, according to the latest weekly report from CoinShares, last week witnessed a $1.9 billion inflow into digital asset investment products, maintaining a positive trend for 15 consecutive weeks. This has led to the total inflows for the month reaching a record-breaking $11.2 billion, far exceeding the $7.6 billion in December 2024 following the US election. Fund flows differed by region. The United States and Germany saw significant inflows of $2 billion and $70 million respectively, while offsetting outflows from Brazil ($23.2 million), Canada ($84.3 million), and Hong Kong ($160 million).Ethereum demonstrated outstanding performance and led exceptionally last week with an inflow of $1.59 billion, marking it as the second-highest single-week inflow on record. Year-to-date, Ethereum has seen total inflows of $7.79 billion, surpassing the inflow total for the entire previous year.In contrast, Bitcoin saw a relatively small outflow of $175 million in total, showing a signi

item.title: US Stock Ethereum Reserve Concept Stock Soars Pre-market, SBET up by 7.59%
item.description: On July 28th, in pre-market trading: Ethereum reserve concept stocks in the US stock market witnessed a general upward trend, including:· SharpLink Gaming (SBET.US) increased by 7.59%;· BTCS Inc (BTCS.US) rose by 6.30%;· Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR.US) went up by 3.49%;· GameSquare (GAME.US) gained by 7.80%;· Bit Digital (BTBT.US) advanced by 5.40%;· Coinbase (COIN.US) rose by 2.26%.

item.title: If Bitcoin breaks $121,000, the mainstream CEX cumulative short liquidation pressure will reach $1.145 billion
item.description: On July 28th, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin manages to break through $121,000, the total short liquidation intensity across mainstream CEXs will amount to $1.145 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin drops below $117,000, the total long liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $1.594 billion.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not disclose the exact number of contracts set to be liquidated or the precise value of those contracts. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, the intensity.Consequently, the liquidation chart showcases the extent to which the asset price reaching a certain level will be impacted. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, it will trigger a more intense reaction due to a liquidity avalanche.

item.title: 10x Research: Bitcoin to Provide Better Risk-Reward Entry Point if Pullback Reaches May High Support
item.description: On July 28th, Markus Thielen, the director of 10x Research, stated that for traders aiming to participate in Bitcoin's upward trend, waiting for Bitcoin to retrace to the high support level near $111,673 in May will offer a better risk-reward entry point.In a report sent to clients, Thielen pointed out, "We expect Bitcoin to retest its breakout level at $111,673 in order to provide a more favorable risk/reward entry point." He explained that the market frequently retests breakout points before a significant bull run, so the possibility of a retracement to this level cannot be ignored. Thielen further added that if a significant pullback does not take place, the optimal entry point would be above the $120,000 breakout, which marks the breakout of the downtrend line from the highs on July 14th and 23rd.

item.title: BNB Market Cap Surpasses Strategy, SoftBank, Nike, and More Companies
item.description: On July 28th, according to the data of 8marketcap, the market capitalization of BNB has reached $119.14 billion, with a 24-hour change of +7.27%. It has now surpassed companies such as Strategy ($115.09 billion), SoftBank ($112.95 billion), and Nike ($112.64 billion). Currently, BNB ranks 185th in the global asset market capitalization list.

item.title: UBS: Prepare for Potential Market Volatility
item.description: On July 28th, UBS Wealth Management Investment Office stated that since the peak of concerns triggered by the U.S. tariff policy in April, the S&P 500 Index has witnessed a nearly 30% increase. This reveals that investors are increasingly convinced that the U.S. will reach a compromise with its major trading partners. Recent data also shows that the U.S. economy has maintained its resilience, and market sentiment has been boosted by top tech companies continuously increasing their capital expenditures in artificial intelligence.UBS also warned that the recent significant gains in the past few weeks have already factored in a lot of potential positive news, and investors should be prepared for possible market volatility in the coming weeks. While the market will be encouraged by the increased certainty of U.S.-EU trade, the level of U.S. tariffs still remains about six times higher than the pre-Liberation Day level. The economic impact of these tariffs is currently unfolding, and unce

item.title: The AI Agent Platform Bankr is currently developing an API to support agent-based encrypted payments and an information layer.
item.description: On July 28th, the AI agent platform Bankr disclosed that it is in the process of developing the Bankr API. This API will enable agents or apps to utilize Bankr as a cryptographic payment or information layer. In the first phase, BNKR is used to pay for each query via x402 and obtain transaction data execution. In the second phase, wallet creation is supported, and it is completely controlled by the agent or app through Bankr.BlockBeats reported previously that on July 24th, Coinbase Ventures announced that it would provide support to Bankr through the Base Ecosystem Fund. Bankr is one of the agent platforms integrated into Coinbase's newly launched Base app. Transaction agents respond more quickly than humans, operate 24/7, and are capable of making more data-driven decisions.

item.title: BNB Surges to Touch $860, Continues to Hit All-Time High
item.description: On July 28th, BNB witnessed a short-term spike and reached $860, continuously hitting a brand-new all-time high. Currently, it is trading at $855.09, and within a 24-hour period, the price has increased by 7.15%.
